General.Name: Huatian Hotel Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Huatian Hotel Group Co.,Ltd. operates and manages hotels in China. It operates hotel under the Huatian Hotel, Huatian Holiday, and Huatian Select brand name. The company was founded in 1995 and is based in Changsha, China.
General.Address: No. 300 Jiefang East Road, Changsha, China, 410001
